channel.title: Oceania on Transgender University Guidance
channel.description: Recent content in Oceania on Transgender University Guidance

item.title: Australia
item.description: Australia # Essential Tools # In Australia, this website transhub.org.au provides a wealth of information. The trans-friendly list on it might not be updated timely. Therefore, it’s suggested to visit r/transgenderau - Reddit to see discussions and gather more information. Transgender Medical Resources # In Australia, adults can proceed with informed consent to access Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT) / Gender Affirming Hormone Treatment. Specifically, you can contact a local qualified doctor.
